data.title: Know All About Gajak at NDTV Food
data.meta_description: Get Gajak latest information and updates. Read latest Gajak articles, watch Gajak videos and much more at NDTV Food
data.text:
Watch: How To Make Winter-Special Peanut Gajak At Home

This peanut gajak recipe will give the perfect snack to keep you warm in winter.

Huma Qureshi's Post Workout Snack Is Gajak: 4 Reasons To Love This Healthy Winter Sweet!

Gajak is made from white sesame seeds and jaggery and it is healthy for consumption during winters for a number of reasons. Here's why Huma Qureshi is eating this winter sweet as a post-workout snack!

Winter Treat: Make This Winter Special Peanut Gajak At Home Under 30 Minutes

Gajak is a warm winter treat that is nutty and sweet, and can easily be made at home as well.

Mira Kapoor Indulges In Winter-Special Gajak: 5 Yummy Chikki Recipes

Mira Kapoor took to Instagram to share her love for winter-special Gajak, and we have found 5 yummy Chikki recipes for you too.

Winter Street Food Of North India: Gajak, Daulat Ki Chaat And More

Love street food? Here are winter favourites from North India - gazak, chikki, daulat ki chaat and more. If you still haven't tried these delicious winter delights, it's time you must!

Love Chikki In Winter? Try This Dry Fruit Chikki For A Change (Recipe Inside)

Dry fruits chikki recipe: With loads of energy-producing dry fruits, this chikki is perfect to keep warm in winters.

Viral Video: Delhi Vendor Selling Chikki At INR 10 Has United Desi Viewers, Including Parineeti Chopra

A food blogger decided to share the story of a Delhi-based vendor and the now viral video has managed to unite millions of Indians on the internet.

What's On The Thela? 10 Winter Special Treats You Shouldn't Miss!

Selling an assortment of interesting snacking options ranging from murmura to gajak, from ajwain mathris to gur ladoos, these thelas can be found parked every afternoon near offices and metro stations.

9 Warm and Delicious Indian Sweets To Try This Winter

Here're 9 Warm and Delicious Indian Sweets To Try This Winter. Read on to know about the recipes.
